Name: Lost Alone
About the game: You are an intern headed to a secret military lab. Your plane crashes into a helicopter on arrival and you are the only survivor. Now you must hunt down different items to survive. But it's not so simple. Use the W A S D keys to move around a vast environment searching for what you need to survive. Watch the shadows for the monster in the mist. You are being hunted while looking for scattered survival items. You are armed with only a flash light. Enjoy some thrills and jump scares as you hunt down things you need. All the items that glow are what you are looking for. This game has a foggy environment and plenty of jump scares. Explore the vast map, find the items you need to win. More levels to come in future releases.
